summary: Tested UI/UX updates for Bible Lesson Planner: Templates page, navigation changes, and sidebar styling. All features working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 15 tested UI/UX updates: 1) Templates link in nav works, 2) Templates page has search/filters/10 templates, 3) Preview modal works, 4) Use Template creates lesson and redirects, 5) Search bar removed from main nav header, 6) MATERIALS/CROSS REFERENCES in sidebar have uppercase black text styling.

search_bar_removed.notes: Search bar is NOT present in main navigation header - verified

templates_nav_link.notes: Templates link visible and clickable in navigation

templates_page_search.notes: Search input with placeholder 'Search templates by title, passage, or theme...' present

templates_category_filters.notes: All Templates, Holidays & Seasons, Parables of Jesus, Old Testament Heroes, New Testament, Character Themes filters available

templates_age_filters.notes: All Ages, Preschool (3-5), Elementary (6-10), Pre-Teen (11-13) filters available

templates_count.notes: 10 lesson templates displayed in grid (page shows '10 templates found'). Note: 3 popular templates shown separately above the main grid.

template_preview_modal.notes: Preview button opens modal with template details (Memory Verse, Learning Objectives, Lesson Sections, Materials)

use_template_button.notes: Use Template button creates lesson in local storage and redirects to /lesson/$lessonId page

sidebar_cross_references_styling.notes: CROSS REFERENCES heading has uppercase black text styling (text-stone-900 dark:text-stone-100 uppercase)

sidebar_materials_styling.notes: MATERIALS heading has uppercase black text styling (text-stone-900 dark:text-stone-100 uppercase)
